short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically save every tweet you view so you can find it later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever get frustrated because you can't find that tweet you just saw? Tweet Saver saves every tweet that scrolls across your screen so you can easily search for and locate it later.
